name: modular-agentic-dev
description: Structured framework for session-based, agent-driven development with modular prompts, audit checkpoints, subagent roles, and simulation harnesses. Inspired by Mitchell Hashimoto's Ghostty workflow.
author: jmanhype

commands.name: session-plan
commands.description: Initialize a new AI development session with planning phase

commands.name: session-scaffold
commands.description: Scaffold project structure from session plan

commands.name: session-simulate
commands.description: Run simulations and test harness against current code

commands.name: session-finalize
commands.description: Finalize session with human review and approval

agents.name: planner
agents.description: High-level task planning and decomposition agent

agents.name: coder
agents.description: Implementation specialist for writing clean, efficient code

agents.name: reviewer
agents.description: Code review and quality assurance specialist

agents.name: tester
agents.description: Comprehensive testing and quality assurance specialist

agents.name: researcher
agents.description: Deep research and information gathering specialist

hooks.name: pre_prompt_validator
hooks.description: Validate and normalize prompts before AI processing

hooks.name: post_diff_tester
hooks.description: Run tests after code generation and validate outputs

hooks.name: session_logger
hooks.description: Log all session interactions for audit trail

workflows.name: agentic-development
workflows.description: Complete agentic development workflow from planning to finalization

workflows.name: session-lifecycle
workflows.description: Session lifecycle management with checkpoints and audits

mcp.name: conductor
mcp.description: State management and session coordination via Conductor cockpit

helpers.name: session-init
helpers.description: Initialize session directory structure and metadata

helpers.name: audit-check
helpers.description: Validate session audit trail and maturity checkpoints

optional.SESSION_DIR: Directory for session logs and artifacts (default: .claude/sessions)
optional.AUDIT_LEVEL: Audit verbosity level: minimal, standard, full (default: standard)
